article_title: Creating 'Medicare For All' Isn’t As Easy As It Sounds
article_text: Among Republicans, every discussion of health policy in this presidential-election year has begun with the assumption that the Affordable Care Act is a disaster that must immediately repealed and replaced by some "market-oriented" system that turns back the clock to 2009 or perhaps to an even-much-earlier era when people paid for health care out-of-pocket.
